com.github.lucapino.confluence.helpers

Interface ConfluenceAPI


  • public interface ConfluenceAPI
    Specifies the API paths that are so far supported with this confluence client.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hope

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<Space> createPrivateSpace(Space space)
      Creates a new private Space, viewable only by the Confluence User account used by this ConfluenceClient.
      retrofit2.Call<Space> createSpace(Space space)
      Creates a new Confluence Space using key and name of the given space.
      retrofit2.Call<NoContent> deleteContentById(String id)
      DELETE Content Trashes or purges a piece of Content, based on its ContentType and ContentStatus.
      retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getAllSpaceContent(String spaceKey, Map<String,String> params)
      Fetch all content from a confluence space.
      retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getChildren(String parentId, String type, Map<String,String> params)
      Fetch the children for a given Content identified by the parentId.
      retrofit2.Call<Content> getContentById(String id)
      GET Content
      retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getContentBySpaceKeyAndTitle(String key, String title)
      Perform a search for content, by space key and title.

      Fetch a results object containing a paginated list of content.

      Obtain paginated results of root content available from a given space.

      Obtain a result list of available spaces.

    • Method Detail

      • getContentResults

        @GET(value="rest/api/content")
retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getContentResults()
        Fetch a results object containing a paginated list of content.
        Returns:
        an instance of getContentResults wrapping the list of Content instances obtained from the API call.

      • getContentBySpaceKeyAndTitle

        @GET(value="rest/api/content")
retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getContentBySpaceKeyAndTitle(@Query(value="key")
                                                                                               String key,
                                                                                               @Query(value="title")
                                                                                               String title)
        Perform a search for content, by space key and title.
        Parameters:
        key - the space key to search under.
        title - the title of the piece of content to search for.
        Returns:
        an instance of getContentResults wrapping the list of Content instances obtained from the API call.

      • getChildren

        @GET(value="rest/api/content/{id}/child/{type}")
retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getChildren(@Path(value="id")
                                                                                                String parentId,
                                                                                                @Path(value="type")
                                                                                                String type,
                                                                                                @QueryMap
                                                                                                Map<String,String> params)
        Fetch the children for a given Content identified by the parentId.
        Parameters:
        parentId - the id of the parent Content.
        type - the Type of the Content.
        params - the query parameters mapping.
        Returns:
        a list of all child content, matching params and parentId.

      • getContentById

        @GET(value="rest/api/content/{id}?expand=body.storage")
retrofit2.Call<Content> getContentById(@Path(value="id")
                                                                                                String id)
        GET Content
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the page or blog post to fetch.
        Returns:
        the Content instance representing the JSON response.

      • postContentConversion

        @POST(value="rest/api/contentbody/convert/{to}")
retrofit2.Call<Storage> postContentConversion(@Body
                                                                                                Storage storage,
                                                                                                @Path(value="to")
                                                                                                String convertToFormat)
        POST Conversion request. Used for converting between storage formats.
        Parameters:
        storage - the storage instance to convert.
        convertToFormat - the representation to convert to.
        Returns:
        an instance of Storage that contains the result of the conversion request.

      • postContent

        @POST(value="rest/api/content")
retrofit2.Call<Content> postContent(@Body
                                                                     Content content)
        POST Content.
        Parameters:
        content - the piece of Content to be included in the body of the request.
        Returns:
        The Content reference updated (with id) by confluence.

      • postContentWithCallback

        @POST(value="rest/api/content")
void postContentWithCallback(@Body
                                                              Content content,
                                                              retrofit2.Callback<Content> callback)
        Same as postContent(com.github.lucapino.confluence.model.Content) but clients can provide a callback with success and failure hooks.
        Parameters:
        content - the piece of Content to be included in the body of the request.
        callback - this handle provides a means of inquiring about the success or failure of the invocation.

      • deleteContentById

        @DELETE(value="rest/api/content/{id}")
retrofit2.Call<NoContent> deleteContentById(@Path(value="id")
                                                                                    String id)
        DELETE Content

        Trashes or purges a piece of Content, based on its ContentType and ContentStatus. There are three cases:

        • If the content is trashable and its status is ContentStatus#CURRENT, it will be trashed.
        • If the content is trashable, its status is ContentStatus#TRASHED and the "status" query parameter in the request is "trashed", the content will be purged from the trash and deleted permanently.
        • If the content is not trashable it will be deleted permanently without being trashed.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the page of blog post to be deleted.
        Returns:
        a reference to the message holder, indicating the status of the request.

      • getSpaces

        @GET(value="rest/api/space")
retrofit2.Call<SpaceResultList> getSpaces()
        Obtain a result list of available spaces.
        Returns:
        an instance of SpaceResultList that can be used to obtain a list of spaces available on confluence.

      • createSpace

        @POST(value="rest/api/space")
retrofit2.Call<Space> createSpace(@Body
                                                                 Space space)
        Creates a new Confluence Space using key and name of the given space.
        Parameters:
        space - the Space to create.
        Returns:
        the Space as a confirmation returned by Confluence REST API.

      • createPrivateSpace

        @POST(value="rest/api/space/_private")
retrofit2.Call<Space> createPrivateSpace(@Body
                                                                                 Space space)
        Creates a new private Space, viewable only by the Confluence User account used by this ConfluenceClient.
        Parameters:
        space - the Space to create.
        Returns:
        the Space as a confirmation returned by Confluence REST API.

      • getAllSpaceContent

        @GET(value="rest/api/space/{spaceKey}/content/page")
retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getAllSpaceContent(@Path(value="spaceKey")
                                                                                                           String spaceKey,
                                                                                                           @QueryMap
                                                                                                           Map<String,String> params)
        Fetch all content from a confluence space.
        Parameters:
        spaceKey - the key that identifies the target Space.
        params - the query parameters.
        Returns:
        a list of all content in the given Space identified by spaceKey.

      • getRootContentBySpaceKey

        @GET(value="rest/api/space/{spaceKey}/content/{type}")
retrofit2.Call<ContentResultList> getRootContentBySpaceKey(@Path(value="spaceKey")
                                                                                                                   String spaceKey,
                                                                                                                   @Path(value="type")
                                                                                                                   String contentType)
        Obtain paginated results of root content available from a given space.
        Parameters:
        spaceKey - the space key of the space to search.
        contentType - the type of content to return.
        Returns:
        a wrapper model around the ContentResultList resulting from this call.
